title: Junior Artist Kit
desc: This Combo Kit contains two different crafts and each of them uses a completely different raw material. The user gets an opportunity to unleash his/her creativity in each of the crafts and keeping them occupied for at least 8 hours.This combo kit helps in planning and organization along with boosting their confidence because there is no 'right answer' in art
include: Tic-Tac-Toe Kit, Keychain Kit, Pebble Photo Holder Kit, Magnet Holder Kit, Canvas Nameplate Kit, Pebble Painting Kit (5 Pebbles)
